name: Motorcar Parts of America, Inc.
description: Motorcar Parts of America, Inc. (MPAA) is a leading manufacturer and distributor of aftermarket automotive parts, specializing in starter motors and alternators. Founded in 1960 and headquartered in Torrance, California, the company has established itself as a key player in the automotive parts industry, providing high-quality products to both domestic and international markets. MPAA is dedicated to innovation, having invested significantly in research and development to ensure that its products meet the evolving needs of the automotive sector. The company’s product portfolio includes a wide range of components such as battery cables, fuel pumps, and various electrical products, catering to a diverse customer base including automotive retailers and wholesalers. Motorcar Parts of America is also committed to sustainability and efficiency, employing advanced manufacturing processes to reduce waste and energy consumption. With a strong focus on customer service, quality assurance, and continuous improvement, MPAA strives to deliver exceptional value to its clients while maintaining its reputation for excellence in the automotive aftermarket. The company remains well-positioned to capitalize on the growing demand for automotive parts and accessories in an increasingly competitive market.

seo.meta_title: Motorcar Parts of America, Inc. | Aftermarket Automotive Parts Manufacturer
seo.meta_description: Explore Motorcar Parts of America, Inc., a leader in the manufacturing and distribution of aftermarket automotive parts, specializing in starter motors and alternators.

faq.question: What does Motorcar Parts of America specialize in?
faq.answer: Motorcar Parts of America specializes in the manufacturing of starter motors and alternators for the aftermarket automotive industry.

faq.question: Where is Motorcar Parts of America headquartered?
faq.answer: Motorcar Parts of America is headquartered in Torrance, California, USA.

faq.question: When was Motorcar Parts of America founded?
faq.answer: Motorcar Parts of America was founded in 1960.
